virus

Class VirusGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • virus.VirusGroup

  • public class VirusGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    main.virus.VirusGroup that holds its own images.background.viruses, it receives commands from the manager and then delegates them to the images.background.viruses

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirusGroup(Virus v)
      creates a virus group
      VirusGroup(Virus[] toAdd)
      overloaded constructor, has a array list of images.background.viruses to add and assigns a group number typically called when splitting groups
